text: Déjà Vu is a 1985 British fantasy drama movie directed by Anthony B. Richmond and based on the novel Always by Trevor Meldal-Johnsen. It stars Jaclyn Smith, Nigel Terry, Shelley Winters, Claire Bloom and was distributed by Cannon Films. ==Other websites== * * Category:1985 drama movies Category:1985 fantasy movies Category:1980s British drama movies Category:British fantasy movies
title: Déjà Vu (1985 movie)
